reviews.review_msg: EDUC370 was so enjoyable because of him. He was very understanding, caring, and engaging. I would recommend this class with him.

A true gem of a professor. I can't believe he's not given more classes to teach. simply incredible, passionate, very knowledgeable and caring. Don't miss out and take his class if you ever get the chance.

He is incredibly kind and caring towards his students, truly embodying the material he teaches! He is very willing to take time out of his day to discuss material and help students. Definitely recommend!!!
such a great professor! caring, respectful, accessible, etc. the course content is super interesting too! i love the way he evaluates and assesses your work. take this course if u can!!!

Dale is the most down-to-earth prof. Not only because he always try his best to include everyone (not just saying hi to class but actually say our names!!!!! We had about 25 people in our class and Dale will say hi like 25 times with our name:) How could you not love him?) very approachable and able to simplify complicated concepts!

Dale wants his students to thrive, and he'll do anything to make that happen. He cares about us and understands that we have other aspects of our lives than school. He is accommodating with due dates and the way the course is formatted. He can occasionally ramble during lectures, but what he has to say is important. He is devoted!

Dale is one of the best instructors I've had. He is extremely passionate about what he teaches, and is the most supportive, fair human ever. He talks a lot, but what he has to say is insightful and thought-provoking. He cares so much about his subject and his students. 100% would take any class offered with him!!

Dale is an excellent professor who cares about his students and the material that he is teaching. Would 100% take his class again as he made learning the material enjoyable. Very nice person and a fun professor.

Dale is one of the best professors ever! He is hilarious and makes even the most serious of topics interesting. He was always accessible after class to answer any questions or to discuss deadlines and was very flexible! He picks really interesting articles that are discussed in class along with group presentations on the articles every other week
